#Text= Zuko says : " You should count yourself lucky that the Avatar spared your life .

column1: #Text=" Ozai says : " Hmph .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Banishing me was the best thing you could have done for my life .
#Text=It put me on the right path .
#Text=Perhaps your time in here could do the same for you .
#Text=" Ozai says : " Why are you really here ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Because you 're going to tell me something .
#Text=Where is my mother ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Zuko , stop moving !
#Text=I 'm trying to capture the moment .
#Text=I wanted to do a painting , so we always remember the good times together .
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's very thoughtful of you , Sokka .
#Text=Wait , why did you give me Momo 's ears ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Those are your hair loopies !
#Text=" Zuko says : " At least you do n't look like a boar - q - pine !
#Text=My hair is not that spiky !
#Text=" Mai says : " I look like a man .
#Text=" Suki says : " And why did you paint me firebending ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I thought it looked more exciting that way .
#Text=Oh , you think you can do a better job , Momo ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Hey , my belly 's not that big anymore .
#Text=I 've really trimmed down .
#Text=" Toph says : " Well I think you all look perfect !

#Text=" Main Aang Iroh Katara Sokka Suki Toph Zuko Antagonists Azula Firebending soldiers Ozai says : " Minor Bato Fire Sages Foggy Swamp Tribe Hakoda Haru Kyoshi Warriors Lion turtle ( flashback only ) Mai Mechanist Pipsqueak Teo The Big Bad Hippo The Boulder The Duke Ty Lee Tyro " Katara says : " Look , the Inner Wall !
#Text=I ca n't believe we finally made it to Ba Sing Se in one piece .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , do n't jinx it !
#Text=We can still be attacked by some giant exploding Fire Nation spoon .
#Text=Or find out the city 's been submerged in an ocean full of killer shrimp !
#Text=" Toph says : " You been hitting the cactus juice again ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I 'm just sayin ' , weird stuff happens to us .
#Text="
